text: He imana rakhanarya lokanno! Allahace bhaya balagata raha ani tyacya paigambaravara imana rakha, allaha tumhala apalya dayene duppata his'sa de'ila ani tumhala divya teja (nura) pradana karila, jyacya prakasata tumhi calala ani to (tumace aparadhihi) mapha karila, allaha motha mapha karanara atisaya dayavana ahe
